title: Vans Women's Doheny Platform Sneaker
descriptions:
Step up your style with the Vans Women’s Doheny Platform Sneaker—where iconic heritage meets modern lift. Inspired by the classic Vans Era and Authentic silhouettes, this platform take brings effortless edge to every outfit while delivering all-day comfort.

Why you’ll love it:
- Elevated platform profile: Adds height and a bold, fashion-forward look without sacrificing stability.
- Built to last: Double-stitched uppers and vulcanized construction provide reliable durability for daily wear.
- Signature grip: Vans’ iconic rubber waffle outsole offers trusted traction and board-ready feel.
- Comfort you can feel: Designed for increased comfort so you can go from morning to night with ease.

From street style to weekend adventures, the Doheny Platform pairs perfectly with denim, dresses, and everything in between. Lace up a timeless classic—now with a lift and a little extra attitude.
